collectionMetadata.name: Realtime Weather Readings across Singapore
collectionMetadata.description: NEA provides APIs for readings of temperature, humidity, precipitation and wind conditions at up to one-minute intervals. The data is provided at weather-station level.

datasetMetadata.name: Legacy Wind Direction across Singapore
datasetMetadata.description:
Minute-by-minute wind direction readings at weather station level, updated every five minutes.

 

This dataset contains data from 2016 to Dec 2023. For present data from January 2024, access the **[Wind Direction across Singapore](https://beta.data.gov.sg/datasets/d_534cf203023b51f51f879145ccc56ff9/view)** dataset.

 

These data are collected from automated weather instruments, and is automatically published as soon as it is generated. There could be instances when there are gaps in the data due to technical problems. The data is subject to correction subsequently if necessary.

 

While every effort has been made to site the instruments in relatively unobstructed areas to provide the best possible indication of the general weather conditions, there are times when this is not possible. The readings from the instruments could thus be influenced by local conditions.

 

The wind observations on this page refers to the mean wind over a period of 10 minutes. The data is available at 1-minute resolution.

While every effort has been made to site the instruments in relatively unobstructed areas to provide the best possible indication of the general weather conditions, there are times when this is not possible. The readings from the instruments could thus be influenced by local conditions.

datasetMetadata.name: Legacy Relative Humidity across Singapore

Minute-by-minute relative humidity readings at weather-station level, updated every five minutes.

These data are collected from automated weather instruments, and is automatically published as soon as it is generated. There could be instances when there are gaps in the data due to technical problems. The data is subject to correction subsequently if necessary.

datasetMetadata.name: Legacy Rainfall across Singapore
datasetMetadata.description:
Precipitation readings at weather-station level, updated every five minutes.

 

This dataset contains data from 2016 to Dec 2023. For present data from January 2024, access the **[Rainfall across Singapore](https://beta.data.gov.sg/datasets/d_6580738cdd7db79374ed3152159fbd69/view)** dataset.

 

These data are collected from automated weather instruments, and is automatically published as soon as it is generated. There could be instances when there are gaps in the data due to technical problems. The data is subject to correction subsequently if necessary.

 

While every effort has been made to site the instruments in relatively unobstructed areas to provide the best possible indication of the general weather conditions, there are times when this is not possible. The readings from the instruments could thus be influenced by local conditions.

datasetMetadata.name: Legacy Air Temperature across Singapore
datasetMetadata.description:
Minute-by-minute air temperature readings at weather-station level.

 

This dataset contains data from 2016 to Dec 2023. For present data from January 2024, access the **[Air Temperature across Singapore](https://beta.data.gov.sg/datasets/d_66b77726bbae1b33f218db60ff5861f0/view)** dataset.

 

These data are collected from automated weather instruments, and is automatically published as soon as it is generated. There could be instances when there are gaps in the data due to technical problems. The data is subject to correction subsequently if necessary.

 

While every effort has been made to site the instruments in relatively unobstructed areas to provide the best possible indication of the general weather conditions, there are times when this is not possible. The measurements from the instruments could thus be influenced by local conditions e.g., measurements at some coastal stations may be strongly influenced by the surrounding sea.
